verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> month, the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that <S%H582>certain<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me.
Then <S%H1961>came<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> Are you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of me? As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> I will not be <S%H1875>inquired<s%> of by you.
Will you <S%H8199>judge<s%> them, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> will you <S%H8199>judge<s%> them? cause them to <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers:<s%>

And <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> In the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and made myself <S%H3045>known<s%> to them in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> when I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%>

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to them, to <S%H3318>bring<s%> them <S%H3318>forth<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> that I had <S%H8446>espied<s%> for them, <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> <S%H1958>which<s%> is the <S%H6643>glory<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H776>lands:<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I to them, <S%H7993>Cast<s%> you away every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H8251>abominations<s%> of his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H2930>defile<s%> not yourselves with the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

But they <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against me, and <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me: they did not every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7993>cast<s%> away the <S%H8251>abominations<s%> of their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> did they <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> then I <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H8210>pour<s%> out my <S%H2534>fury<s%> on them, to <S%H3615>accomplish<s%> my <S%H639>anger<s%> against them in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

But I <S%H6213>worked<s%> for my <S%H8034>name's<s%> <S%H4616>sake,<s%> that it should not be <S%H2490>polluted<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they were, in <S%H853>whose<s%> <S%H5869>sight<s%> I made myself <S%H3045>known<s%> to them, in <S%H3318>bringing<s%> them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
Why I caused them to <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H3045>showed<s%> them my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do,<s%> he shall even <S%H2425>live<s%> in them.

<S%H1571>Moreover<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them my <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> to be a <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and them, that they might <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them.

But the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against me in the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> they <S%H1980>walked<s%> not in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and they <S%H3988>despised<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do,<s%> he shall even <S%H2425>live<s%> in them; and my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> they <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H2490>polluted:<s%> then I <S%H559>said,<s%> I would <S%H8210>pour<s%> out my <S%H2534>fury<s%> on them in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> to <S%H3615>consume<s%> them.

But I <S%H6213>worked<s%> for my <S%H8034>name's<s%> <S%H4616>sake,<s%> that it should not be <S%H2490>polluted<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> in <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H5869>sight<s%> I <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out.

Yet <S%H1571>also<s%> I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to them in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> that I would not <S%H935>bring<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I had <S%H5414>given<s%> them, <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> <S%H1958>which<s%> is the glory of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H776>lands;<s%>

<S%H3282>Because<s%> they <S%H3988>despised<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H1980>walked<s%> not in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> but <S%H2490>polluted<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths:<s%> for their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1544>idols.<s%>
Nevertheless my <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>spared<s%> them from <S%H7843>destroying<s%> them, <S%H3808>neither<s%> did I <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H3615>end<s%> of them in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

But I <S%H559>said<s%> to their <S%H1121>children<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H3212>Walk<s%> you not in the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H8104>observe<s%> their <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H2930>defile<s%> yourselves with their <S%H1544>idols:<s%>
I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them;

And <S%H6942>hallow<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths;<s%> and they shall be a <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and you, that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

Notwithstanding the <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against me: they <S%H1980>walked<s%> not in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> them, <S%H834>which<s%> if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do,<s%> he shall even <S%H2425>live<s%> in them; they <S%H2490>polluted<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths:<s%> then I <S%H559>said,<s%> I would <S%H8210>pour<s%> out my <S%H2534>fury<s%> on them, to <S%H3615>accomplish<s%> my <S%H639>anger<s%> against them in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

Nevertheless I <S%H7725>withdrew<s%> my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H6213>worked<s%> for my <S%H8034>name's<s%> <S%H4616>sake,<s%> that it should not be <S%H2490>polluted<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> in <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H5869>sight<s%> I <S%H3318>brought<s%> them <S%H3318>forth.<s%>

I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to them <S%H1571>also<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> that I would <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them through the <S%H776>countries;<s%>

<S%H3282>Because<s%> they had not <S%H6213>executed<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> but had <S%H3988>despised<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and had <S%H2490>polluted<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> and their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1>fathers'<s%> <S%H1544>idols.<s%>
Why I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H2706>statutes<s%> that were not <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> whereby they should not <S%H2421>live;<s%>

And I <S%H2930>polluted<s%> them in their own <S%H4979>gifts,<s%> in that they caused to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the fire <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6363>opens<s%> the <S%H7356>womb,<s%> that I might make them <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> to the <S%H4616>end<s%> that they might <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H5750>Yet<s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H1442>blasphemed<s%> me, in that they have <S%H4603>committed<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against me.

For when I had <S%H935>brought<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> for the <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> it to them, then they <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5687>thick<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> and they <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> their <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H5414>presented<s%> the <S%H3708>provocation<s%> of their <S%H7133>offering:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> also they <S%H7760>made<s%> their <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell,<s%> and <S%H5258>poured<s%> out <S%H8033>there<s%> their <S%H5262>drink<s%> offerings.

Then I <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4100>What<s%> is the <S%H1116>high<s%> place <S%H834>whereunto<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H935>go?<s%> And the <S%H8034>name<s%> whereof is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1117>Bamah<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H3651>Why<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> Are you <S%H2930>polluted<s%> after the <S%H1870>manner<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers?<s%> and <S%H2181>commit<s%> you <S%H2181>prostitution<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H8251>abominations?<s%>

For when you <S%H5375>offer<s%> your <S%H4979>gifts,<s%> when you make your <S%H1121>sons<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H784>fire,<s%> you <S%H2930>pollute<s%> yourselves with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1544>idols,<s%> even to this <S%H3117>day:<s%> and shall I be <S%H1875>inquired<s%> of by you, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> I will not be inquired of by you.

And that which <S%H5927>comes<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> your <S%H7307>mind<s%> shall not be at all, that you <S%H559>say,<s%> We will be as the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> as the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H776>countries,<s%> to <S%H8334>serve<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone.<s%>

As I live, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and with a <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and with <S%H2534>fury<s%> <S%H8210>poured<s%> out, will I <S%H4427>rule<s%> over you:

And I will <S%H3318>bring<s%> you out from the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and will <S%H6908>gather<s%> you out of the <S%H776>countries<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> you are <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and with a <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and with <S%H2534>fury<s%> <S%H8210>poured<s%> out.

And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> will I <S%H8199>plead<s%> with you <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face.<s%>

Like as I <S%H8199>pleaded<s%> with your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will I <S%H8199>plead<s%> with you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
And I will cause you to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H4562>bond<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant:<s%>

And I will <S%H1305>purge<s%> out from among you the <S%H4775>rebels,<s%> and them that <S%H6586>transgress<s%> against me: I will <S%H3318>bring<s%> them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>country<s%> where they <S%H4033>sojourn,<s%> and they shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

As for you, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3212>Go<s%> you, <S%H5647>serve<s%> you <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H1544>idols,<s%> and <S%H310>hereafter<s%> also, <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me: but <S%H2490>pollute<s%> you my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> with your <S%H4979>gifts,<s%> and with your <S%H1544>idols.<s%>

For in my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H4791>height<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> me: <S%H8033>there<s%> will I <S%H7521>accept<s%> them, and <S%H8033>there<s%> will I <S%H1875>require<s%> your <S%H8641>offerings,<s%> and the first <S%H7225>fruits<s%> of your <S%H4864>oblations,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your holy things.

I will <S%H7521>accept<s%> you with your <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell,<s%> when I <S%H3318>bring<s%> you out from the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> you out of the <S%H776>countries<s%> wherein you have been <S%H6327>scattered;<s%> and I will be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in you <S%H5869>before<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I shall <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>country<s%> for the <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> it to your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And <S%H8033>there<s%> shall you <S%H2142>remember<s%> your <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5949>doings,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> you have been <S%H2930>defiled;<s%> and you shall <S%H6962>loathe<s%> yourselves in your own <S%H6440>sight<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H7451>evils<s%> that you have <S%H6213>committed.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>when I have <S%H6213>worked<s%> with you for my <S%H8034>name's<s%> <S%H4616>sake,<s%> not according to your <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>ways,<s%> nor according to your <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> <S%H5949>doings,<s%> O you <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

And <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of the <S%H5045>south,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in you, and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> in you, and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H6086>tree:<s%> the <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H7957>flame<s%> shall not be <S%H3518>quenched,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6440>faces<s%> from the <S%H5045>south<s%> to the <S%H6828>north<s%> shall be <S%H6866>burned<s%> therein.
And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1197>kindled<s%> it: it shall not be <S%H3518>quenched.<s%>
Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H162>Ah<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD!<s%> they <S%H559>say<s%> of me, Does he not <S%H4911>speak<s%> <S%H4912>parables?<s%>
